SENT.plain: Sagittal sinus thrombosis (SSST) is a rare disease with high mortality
Definitive therapy is not known, but anticoagulation or addressing the underlying etiology have been the most often utilized approaches
We here report the second case of postpartum sagittal sinus thrombosis successfully treated with urokinase
Though there are no studies to support this therapy it may be safe and efficacious in refractory cases
